documents.document: Wow. I went to Iran in 2013 and wasn't Prime Minister of anywhere. Think I'll avoid visiting America any time soon. https://t.co/gPhUvEN2Qt
Catching up on last night's Graham Norton and really loving Harriet Harmon. Can we have her as Labour leader please?

Contemplating dinner. Do I go for the healthy option I'd been planning, or do I make poutine (albeit with regular cheese, not curds)??

How many times do dead cows feature in The X-Files??
Oooh Eve is on Spike. Bit of X-Files to end the weekend? Don't mind if I do.
Listening to 'If You Tolerate This...' It feels worryingly apt in current political climes.

Had a great time seeing Gruff Rhys and Set Fire To The Stars. Even got a bonus James Dean Bradfield sighting! I love living in Cardiff.
Can people please stop making adverts that feature knocking and/or doorbells? It makes me paranoid there's someone at the door...
Ahhh @TheLastLeg coming up with bonus David Tennant?? That's my kind of Friday night.
Intriguing!! I do rather like the idea of an X-Files-inspired comedy with @mradamscott. Partly because I miss him a… https://t.co/kd9opw8Hr5
@EmiGarside @MarkSadlerActor I found someone at the top of Pen Y Fan!! I'm turning this into a drinking game *has a drink*
@MarkSadlerActor @EmiGarside Just found a guy whose profile says 'must have own eyebrows and teet'. I'm assuming he means teeth!! Ha ha ha.
@MarkSadlerActor @EmiGarside That's a good motto in general.
@EmiGarside Ha ha ha ha. So many of them put that!! Also too many photos of men on bikes. Instant swipe left (I'm proper harsh).
@EmiGarside He's also Crump from Drive!! Though it took me a while to realise that - he looks really different in different roles.
Just managed to accidentally throw my glasses into the bath. This probably means I've had enough to drink, right?

I'm simultaneously drinking beer and watching The Man In The High Castle though, so not completely broken.
I'm voluntarily doing some ironing on a Monday night. I think I might be broken.
@pitythebackseat Probably pink and The Lego Movie :-)
Now to change my bed sheets, light some candles, paint my nails, watch a film and drink more wine. #SelfCareSunday #Hygge
Ahhh, just had a lovely soak in the bath, complete with ace music (shuffle chose to be very Jarvis heavy) and some red wine. Lush.
Apologies for the lack of Top 777 blog post this weekend (if anyone noticed or cared!). I'll try and get a mid-week one up if I can.

Lex: Did you think I'd just roll over? Fine: No, not you. Not without a bone.
Bwa ha ha ha. The HoYay just got less subtexty. #smallville
@Laurem_ipsum I feel like that too.
Oh my god, that baby on the ceiling's going to give me nightmares. #Trainspotting
The poll's still set to run for a bit, but I'm calling it for Trainspotting. It probably is about time I actually watched it. Thanks all!
Episode III is the only Star Wars film I've never seen (in case it seemed a really random choice!)
I've never done a poll before, it's quite exciting!! Most are films I've never seen before (the exception being Moulin Rouge).
Being characteristically indecisive, so Twitter, help me decide which film to watch tonight...
@EmiGarside Definitely not wrong - especially if you're on a train! It's surely one of the great perks of trains over buses.
Shows that end with a cliffhanger and then they never make any more episodes. Aghhhhh!! Why had I forgotten this?? #CarolineInTheCity
@easyqueenie It's loaded for me now - I've copied and pasted the list on Facebook. There is a Log Lady!!! :-D
Trying to view the new Twin Peaks Funko Pops but it seems like the site's overloaded with the excitement! Please tell me there's a Log Lady?
Woohoo!!! Not seen them live since 2009. Excited! https://t.co/GVt1v0ZdTQ
Watching a Caroline In The City episode where there's the new and mysterious world of the Internet and Cyber Cafés. Feeling old. #90s
Yesssssss!! Me too. https://t.co/CznUm1GMz1
@LaDownie I got them all on DVD for Christmas. I'm re-addicted!!
I seem to have spent most of this weekend watching Caroline In The City (being the stuck-in-the-'90s cliché that I am). I regret nothing.
